t: Then*pn you will say on that day, “I*ln will give thanks to You, O Lord;*s For*ln although You were angry with me, Your*ln anger is turned away, And*ln You comfort me.
Behold,*ln God is my salvation, I*ln will trust and not be afraid; For*ln the Lord*s God*s is my strength and song, And*ln He has become my salvation.”
Therefore*ln you will joyously draw water From*ln the springs of salvation.
And*ln in that day you will say, “Give*ln thanks to the Lord,*s call on His name. Make*ln known His deeds among the peoples; Make*ln them*i remember that His name is exalted.”
Praise*ln the Lord*s in song, for He has done excellent things; Let*ln this be known throughout the earth.
Cry*ln aloud and shout for joy, O inhabitant of Zion, For*ln great in your midst is the Holy One of Israel.
